definition: dagger-axe/abbr. for 戈瑞[ge1 rui4]/(Tw) abbr. for 戈雷[ge1 lei2]
to put on a play/to perform/fig. to pretend/to feign
large-scale Chinese opera/Beijing opera/major dramatic production (movie, TV series etc)
opera (or role) involving much singing and action/(fig.) highlight/main feature/major activity

sentences.english: He read many books, he went to the theatre, and in the summer he stayed in the country for six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 他讀了許多書，去看過戲，在鄉間避暑待了六個星期。

sentences.english: Was there any negative feedback on your sex scenes or for playing a lesbian?
sentences.chinese: 演拉拉或拍牀戲，有沒有得過任何負面的迴響？

sentences.english: Love is like a play, your friendship, I have to show.
sentences.chinese: 愛情就像一場戲，你的友情客串，我卻傾情演出。

sentences.english: The play succeeded thanks to the wonderful performance of all the .
sentences.chinese: 由於演員們的精彩表演，這部戲獲得了成功。

sentences.english: And it was the poems composing in play itself to get considerable development in the Tang Dynasty too.
sentences.chinese: 並且戲作詩本身也是在唐代得到長足的發展的。

sentences.english: Kylie played the part for the 6-month duration of the series.
sentences.chinese: 剴莉爲這部戲演出了六個月。

sentences.english: There'll be a further performance of the play next week.
sentences.chinese: 這齣戲下星期將加演一場。

sentences.english: People are thronging to see his new play .
sentences.chinese: 人們成羣結隊地去看他那出新戲。

sentences.english: Tang has also written short novels and stage dramas, and directed theater productions.
sentences.chinese: 湯唯也寫過短片小說和舞臺戲，導演戲劇作品。

sentences.english: She did lots of acting when she was at university.
sentences.chinese: 她在大學時演過很多戲。

sentences.english: When the play opened, the local pre gave it the thum down.
sentences.chinese: 這齣戲上演後，當地報紙評價很低。

sentences.english: Somebody called it the most graphic sex ever on TV.
sentences.chinese: 有人說，這是電視歷史上最生動的牀戲。

sentences.english: B. Future plans of APB Expo.
They were using the mustard-jar scene in the audition.
sentences.chinese: 他們那時準備用芥末醬罐頭的一段戲來試鏡。

sentences.english: Cuse: But the show's already violated a lot of conventional wisdom about television.
sentences.chinese: 這部戲已經打破了很多電視界的常規了。

definition: theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
script for play, opera, movie etc/screenplay/scenario
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
cast and crew/performers and production team
